titles.title: To amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to provide that the requirement of marking of imported articles and containers not apply to spice products.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/27/1995--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to provide that certain marking requirements with respect to imported articles and containers shall not apply to spice products.
